description: The best time of year is here! What could be better than spending a day making memories with family friends? How about spending time inside shaking up some delicious Classic Snowball? This is perfect for holiday parties or anytime, really!
name: Classic Snowball

recipeInstructions.name: Put a couple of inches of water in a saucepan, nestle a bowl on top of it with egg yolks, sugar, and salt. Whisk until pale and thick. Slowly add the brandy while whisking continuously.
recipeInstructions.text: Put a couple of inches of water in a saucepan, nestle a bowl on top of it with egg yolks, sugar, and salt. Whisk until pale and thick. Slowly add the brandy while whisking continuously.

recipeInstructions.name: Bring the water to a gentle boil, reduce the heat and slowly add the mixture. Whisk until thoroughly combined.
recipeInstructions.text: Bring the water to a gentle boil, reduce the heat and slowly add the mixture. Whisk until thoroughly combined.

recipeInstructions.name: Remove the bowl from heat, add the vanilla and cinnamon. Stir and store into the fridge.
